paragraph.value: Table 1 gives full archive sync size of each data type for geth and ethanos at the
block. Ethanos reduces the total blockchain size
compared to geth. Especially, it reduces the size of Trie nodes
, because ethanos only maintains the state trie only with active accounts during a month which are
% of the total accounts. However, hash field of bloom filter in block header slightly increases Headers, and restore transactions increment Bodies and Receipts
. As a result, ethanos reduced full archive node by
